1. Read a book- identify the genre that excites you the most or you can even try reading different genres
2. Do something creative- try cooking something, making something out of waste, DIY something
3. Spend time with your loved ones- spend quality time with your family at home, call a far away relative or a long lost friend and catch up with things.
4. Try doing work you couldn’t do otherwise- completely work that’s pending, try cleaning your wardrobe or house
5. Most important spend quality time with yourself, that is the most crucial thing. Reflect on your decisions and thoughts.
